_EnvironmentName: Name which will be used to things like the app header and email subjects
_WebUrl: Address to the web application, without the trailing slash

_ConnectionStrings.SimpleScheduler: ...sql server or sqlite connection string - store here or in secrets.json

_MailSettings._: store these here or in secrets.json
_MailSettings.AdminEmail: the admin who receives app error messages and job failures
_MailSettings.UserName: user - optional if you don't use authentication
_MailSettings.Password: password - optional if you don't use authentication
